Movie & Dining: 25% cashback on movie ticket bookings & minimum 15% discount on dining.
Rewards Rate: 4 Edge Rewards on every spend of Rs. 200.
Reward Redemption: The earned Edge Rewards can be redeemed at the Edge Rewards portal at a rate of 1 RP = Re. 0.20.

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on all fuel transactions between Rs. 400 and Rs. 4,000.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawn amount, subject to a minimum of Rs. 500.

product_details: 4 Edge Reward Points on every Rs. 200 spent.
Up to Rs. 1,000 discount every year on movie tickets.
1% Fuel surcharge waiver on all fuel transactions.
Zero liability protection against lost/stolen card.
Withdraw cash up to your credit limit.
